title: Are the Straights OK? with Phoebe Maltz Bovy
itunes:title: Are the Straights OK, with Phoebe Maltz Bovy
description:
Phoebe Maltz Bovy, writer of the essay "Straightness Studies," introduces us to the Tragedy of Heterosexuality. Can queer theory save the straights or are we/they doomed to be trapped in power imbalances and sexual suffering and bad interior decorating decisions forever? 

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual
